page.title: Discover Amazing Restaurants Near You
page.description: Join tapnosh to explore the best dining experiences in your city. Restaurant owners can showcase their venues and connect with food lovers. Browse hundreds of restaurants with detailed menus, photos, and authentic reviews.
page.ogDescription: Join tapnosh to explore the best dining experiences in your city. Restaurant owners can showcase their venues and connect with food lovers.

hero.title: Discover Amazing Restaurants Near You
hero.subtitle: Join our platform to explore the best dining experiences in your city. Restaurant owners can showcase their venues and connect with food lovers.

why.title: Why tapnosh?
why.subtitle: Whether you're a food lover or restaurant owner, we provide the tools and community to enhance your dining experience.

discover.title: Discover Great Food
discover.text: Browse through hundreds of restaurants with detailed menus, photos, and authentic reviews from fellow diners.

owners.title: For Restaurant Owners
owners.text: Showcase your restaurant with beautiful photos, manage your menu, and connect with customers in your area.

community.title: Community Driven
community.text: Join a community of food enthusiasts sharing honest reviews and discovering hidden culinary gems together.

featured.title: Featured Restaurants
featured.subtitle: Explore some of the amazing restaurants already on our platform
